name: Variable Transport Unit's Breakneck Escape
description:
Made in The Games Factory. Should open in Multimedia Fusion or modern Clickteam Fusion, I didn't have time to port it forward.

If it doesn't work, try running it on Windows 95. Sorry.

MIDI music probably need something special installed on Win 10 that I've not figured out.

Controls: Keyboard

Up to accelerate

Left and Right to 'steer'

See how far you can go without crashing!

By Millennium Cyborg

All Assets: Clickteam
